name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Email Privacy Protector: Is My Email Tracked?

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Anytime you open your emails, people could be tracking when you do it, and which links you click on. Protect your email privacy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is an email tracking blocker for Gmail - it blocks all email tracking pixels so preventing marketers and spammers from monitoring when you open emails and click on links, thereby protecting your email privacy and security.

Stop spammers & marketers dead! Anyone who's tracking your emails, will be sorely disappointed. 

Do you know that almost all the emails you receive are tracked to see when you open them and when you click on the links in them?

With this email privacy protector, no one will ever be able to know when you opened your email, or have any information about any links that you clicked. 

This extension will block email tracking attempts used to detect when you open and read emails. Email Privacy Protector displays an 'shields' when it finds and blocks a tracking attempt inside of an email.

How it works:
1. Install the extension.
2. Open an email in your Gmail.
3. You will see a small shield icon in the left corner and the text "This email is being tracked".
4. If you want to notify the sender that you have opened and read the email, hover over the "Tracking is blocked" text and click "Unblock".

Your email privacy and security is our goal.

NOTE: For easy access to your settings and other cloudHQ apps, look for the cloudHQ icon in the top right corner of your Gmail inbox. Click on it to get started!

cloudHQ. Helping your productivity, 1 click at a time.
